title: Homepage
Descrption: The general homepage of the cinema

title: Listings Gallery
Descrption: A gallery showing all the films that a present at the cinema

title: Opening Times
Descrption: Details about the opening times of the cinema

title: New Releases Gallery
Descrption: A gallery showing all the films that show possible new releases at the cinema

title: Classifications
Descrption: A section of the website that shows film classification, such as age rating.

title: Screens
Descrption: A section of the website that the different screens avaliable at the cinema.

title: Ticket Bookings
Descrption: A page dedicated for booking tickets and food products

title: Places to Go
Descrption: A page to see different bars, resturants, activity venue near by the cinema

title: Getting There
Descrption: A page for detail directions to the cinema, with google maps and public transport directions

title: Discussion Board
Descrption: A page that has a discussion board forum for questions, answers and a friendly chat

title: Email Form
Descrption: A page that has the company email, to ask us anything about our products and cinema related

title: About Page
Descrption: A page for purpose of the webiste and the staff or members that built the website for enquires

title: Contact Page
Descrption: Contact the owner of the website or the cinema
